page.title: 03Leisure Survey,(B)Tiptree
page.content: HER "WHAT IS THE MAIN THING YOU DO?" THEN WE ASKED HER "HOW MANY THINGS DO YOU DO THAT COST MONEY?" "TWO" SHE ANSWERED. "WHAT ARE THEY?" WE ASKED "SWIMMING AND W.I." SHE REPLIED. "WHAT IS YOUR FAVOURITE THING YOU DO IN YOUR LEISURE TIME?" WE INQUIRED."GARDENING" SHE ANSWERED. A{QUIET LADY }IN{CHERRY CHASE}SAID SHE DID TWO THINGS IN HER SPARE TIME.WE ASKED HER WHAT THE MAIN THING SHE DID WAS AND SHE REPLIED "READING".SHE REPLIED "ONE" WHEN WE ASKED HER IF ANYTHING SHE DID COSTED MONEY."WHAT IS IT?" WE ASKED "READING" SHE ANSWERED. "WHAT IS YOUR FAVOURITE THING YOU DO?" WE ASKED."READING", SHE ANNOUNCED!
